sentences.sContent: If that worked, hooray! If not, soldier on to the next step.
sentences.sContent_eng: If that worked, hooray! If not, soldier on to the next step.
sentences.sCn: 如果这样行得通，万岁！如果还不行，那就迎着困难进行下一步吧

sentences.sContent: Some people have referred to documentaries like Blue Planet and Planet Earth as 'wildlife porn' – and I'd say hooray to that if it inspires viewers to get out into the natural world.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some people have referred to documentaries like Blue Planet and Planet Earth as 'wildlife porn' – and I'd say hooray to that if it inspires viewers to get out into the natural world.
sentences.sCn: 有些人把《蓝色星球》和《行星地球》这样的纪录片称之为‘野生生命情色片’——如果它们能激发观众亲近自然，那我会为这样的情色高呼万岁。
